name: Christopher ALLEN, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondent

parties: Christopher ALLEN, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus is denied without prejudice to seek relief from the Huntingdon County Common Pleas Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1153
Christopher ALLEN, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondent.
No. 120 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 15, 2007.
